ble.gattPermission: The web browser did not give permission to use Bluetooth Low Energy
ble.gattServiceNotFound: Connected to hub but failed to get {serviceName} service. Try removing the "{hubName}" device in your OS Bluetooth settings, then try again.
ble.noWebBluetooth: This web browser does not support Web Bluetooth or it is not enabled.
ble.connectFailed: Unexpected error while trying to connect. Check console log and report the error.

editor.programChanged: The program was changed in another window. Do you want to delete this program and replace it with the new program?

update.message: A new version of {appName} is available. Click {action} to start using the new version.
